subject: Volleyball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Penn State won its first N.C.A.A. men’s volleyball championship in 14 years, rallying for a 27-30, 33-31, 30-25, 30-23 victory over second-ranked Pepperdine in Irvine, Calif. Matt Anderson had 29 kills for the Nittany Lions (30-1), who beat U.C.L.A. in 1994 for their last title.
